tree.name: Zach Collins
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: Bulls sent Zach LaVine to SAC, received Kevin Huerter (SAC) + Zach Collins and Tre Jones (SAS). De'Aaron Fox to SAS.

assetsGivenUp.name: Zach LaVine
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Bulls traded Jimmy Butler to Timberwolves for Zach LaVine, Kris Dunn, and the 7th pick (Lauri Markkanen)

assetsGivenUp.name: Jimmy Butler
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted 30th overall by Chicago Bulls from Marquette in 2011 NBA Draft
